data.title: Sweet video emerges as veteran actor Olu Jacobs celebrates 82nd birthday, wife Joke Silva celebrates (Watch)
data.meta_description: Sweet video emerges as veteran actor Olu Jacobs celebrates 82nd birthday, wife Joke Silva celebrates (Watch)
data.text:
- Advertisement -

Prayers and wishes have been pouring on the legendary movie star Olu Jacobs as he clocked 82 years old today, 11th July 2024.

His wife and veteran actress, Joke Silva celebrated the movie icon via her Instagram page as she shared a video documenting Olu Jacobs’ childhood memories till date.

A part of the video showed the aged actor on his feet looking agile and happy as he talked to some people in the background.

Join our Entertainment WhatsApp Group

Don’t miss out on any real gist. Join Our WhatsApp group to enjoy updates

CLICK HERE TO JOIN

It is worth noting that Jacobs has left an indelible mark on the Nigerian entertainment industry. His roles in numerous films and television shows have earned him accolades and a special place in the hearts of audiences both in Nigeria and around the world.

Although Olu Jacobs has been struggling with Dementia since 2021, but he remains well loved and respected. He and Joke Silva have been married since 1989, blessed with three kids.

Recently, the veteran had passed away. The actor’s family had debunked the news with a video of the veteran getting a haircut from someone.

Celebrating his 82nd birthday, Joke Silva wrote, “82 just like that🎷🎷🎶🎵🥂🍾…Agba ko ni nira l’agbara Jesu…Happy birthday and.have an amazing year ahead me darling… Sir J of life 😉 @_olujacobs (loving his customized house coat”.

- Advertisement -

Watch the video below:

Fans and younger colleagues in the movie industry flooded the comment section with their birthday wishes. Some reactions are shown below:

nobledow said, “Dear Lord teach me how to love a woman who in return would show me loads of care like in the most crucial time of my life like Ajoke Silva. Happy birthday Pa Olu Jacobs, more life in Jesus name !! 🙏🏿”

iyaboojofespris said, “Happy birthday, LEGEND 🎂🎉🎊😍🙏”.

realomosexy said, “Happy birthday to a Legend, A father to the Industry, An Outstanding Actor, An Incredible Soul . ❤️❤️❤️”.

idia.aisien said, “Happy birthday to a living LEGEND!!! God bless you both 🙏🎊🎂🙌❤️🥳”.

- Advertisement -

officialosas said, “Happy Birthday Legend! God bless you immensely 🙏🏾🎉💐💖”.

chiomakpotha said, “A LIVING LEGEND! Happy Birthday Sir . We love you 🥰 💕”.

mustiphasholagbade said, “Happy birthday to a living legend 🥂🙏”.
